definition: to receive/to accept/to collect/to put away/to restrain/to stop/in care of (used on address line after name)

sentences.english: Must have Shouhui and the write off of the goods.
sentences.chinese: 必須是已收匯並經覈銷的貨物。

sentences.english: We should develop international tourism and increase foreign exchange earnings through non-trade channels.
sentences.chinese: 要發展國際旅遊，增加非貿易收匯。
